title: Switching From Oral Antipsychotics to LAIs
itunes:title: Switching From Oral Antipsychotics to LAIs
description:
This episode discusses antipsychotic switching from oral antipsychotics to LAIs, including the factors to consider when titrating antipsychotics and establishing PO tolerability before switching to an LAI. 

Faculty: Brian Miller, M.D. 
Host: Richard Seeber, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: Antipsychotic Switching: Intersection of Art and Science
  • Types of Antipsychotic Switching: Between PO Agents and From PO to LAI
